Spells:
Burning Hands (O1 Evoc): R15' Cone inflicts 5d4 HP (DC 14 Ref half)
Fiery Body (O9 Tran): Self gains immunity to fire, blindness, crit, ability damage, deafness, disease, drowning, stunning, and physiology spells, half damage from acid or electricity, +6 Dexterity, 40' Fly, dazzling brightness, 50% miss chance, regains HP/3 from fire damage, and suffers 2d6 HP/rd in water, for 20 min
Fire Seeds (O6 Conj): Touched 4 acorn grenades inflict 20d4 total or 8 berry bombs detonate on command to inflict 1d8+20 in 5' radius (DC 19 Ref half) for 200 min
Fire Storm (O8 Evoc): R300' 40 10' cu inflicts 20d6 HP, then 4d6 HP/rd until extinguished (DC 21 Ref half, initial damage only)
Fireball (O3 Evoc): R1200' Inflicts 10d6 HP (DC 16 Ref half) in 20' radius
Incendiary Cloud (O8 Conj): R300' Fire in 20' radius inflicts 6d6 HP (DC 21 Ref half) while moving away 10'/rd for 20 rd
Resist Energy (O2 Abju): Touched gains resistance 30 to chosen energy for 200 min
Summon Monster V (O5 Conj): R75' 1 5th-, 1d3 4th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Wall Of Fire (O4 Evoc): R300' 400' wall inflicts 2d4 HP to creatures w/in 10', 1d4 HP to creatures w/in 20', 2d6+20 HP when passing through (undead dbl) for conc + 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Burning Magic: Successful fire spell inflicts 1 HP/spell level fire for 1d4 rd (spell DC Ref ends)
Elemental Focus (Acid): +1 save DC on spells that inflict acid damage
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half or all spell damage to cold damage; uses +1 spell slot
Empower Spell: x1.5 chosen spell variable effects uses +2 spell slot
Final Revelation (Flame Mystery): May apply Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell to fire spells w/out cost
Form Of Flame: May use Elemental Body IV effects to become huge fire elemental for 20 hr 1/dy
Gaze Of Flames: R200' Can see out of any flame in range 20 rd/dy
Haunted: Know Mage Hand, Ghost Sound, Levitate, Minor Image, Telekinesis, Reverse Gravity spells
Maximize Spell: Maximize all chosen spell variable effects uses +3 spell slot
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
